wishlists.title: Wishlists
wishlists.description: Easily create and share wishlists for any occasion. Add items from any website with just one click.

events.title: Event Management
events.description: Organize birthdays, weddings, and other celebrations. Send invitations and track responses in real-time.

inspiration.title: Gift Ideas
inspiration.description: Discover personalized suggestions based on your loved ones' interests and preferences.

reminders.title: Smart Reminders
reminders.description: Never miss a birthday or special occasion again with our customizable notifications.

groups.title: Group Gifting
groups.description: Easily organize collective gifts and track everyone's contributions.

privacy.title: Privacy Controls
privacy.description: Decide who can see your lists and what information is shared.

1.content: Gifters has completely transformed how we organize birthdays in our family. No more duplicate gifts and everyone finds something they really like!

2.content: I used Gifters for my wedding and it was amazing! Our guests loved being able to choose from our wishlist and we received exactly what we needed.

3.content: As an event organizer, I recommend Gifters to all my clients. The platform is intuitive and the customer service is exceptional.

4.content: Gifters saved me for the holidays! No more racking my brain to find ideas, everything is centralized and easy to use.
